Introduction.A Nitro Academy é uma escola online de p: Nitro Academy is an online school for vocational initiation projects for teenagers aged 11 to 15 through practical and stimulating projects guided by experienced mentors

HaveYouImagined.Já imaginou criar sua própria fragrância: Have you ever imagined creating your own natural fragrance or making your first online sale? At Nitro Academy, vocation is born through practice

OurApproach.Com projetos práticos, aplicamos conheci: Through practical projects, we apply knowledge to real-world challenges, such as creating a sustainable business or programming an educational game

TeenGirl.Turmas pequenas, projetos divertidos e m: Small groups, engaging projects, and expert mentors

Carousel.Mergulhe no universo do YouTube e aprend: Dive into the world of YouTube and learn how to turn your ideas into amazing videos! Discover how to plan, record, and edit engaging content, as well as understand strategies to grow digitally. In the end, you will publish your own video about how teenagers use their time!
Carousel.Já imaginou ser um cientista e publicar: Have you ever imagined being a scientist and publishing your own discovery? In this course, you will explore and investigate your curiosities using the scientific method! With guidance from a specialist mentor, you will create and test hypotheses, record your findings, and write a real scientific article. In the end, your study will be published in the Nitro Academy Scientific Journal.
Carousel.Você sabia que qualquer pessoa pode escr: Did you know that anyone can write a book? Did you know that you can improve your writing skills in a fun and easy way? In this project, you will turn your ideas into a written story! With the guidance of a mentor who wrote and published her own book in 2023, you will learn how to navigate this journey. In the end, you will have your own authored book in your hands, and your work will be published in an exclusive Nitro Academy collection!
Carousel.Você fará parte de uma empresa virtual q: You will be part of a growing virtual company and will conduct market research, marketing, sales, customer service, and explore practical entrepreneurship fundamentals with an entrepreneur who founded a startup. If you think this is just a game, you will be surprised!
Carousel.E se aprender inglês fosse mais do que e: What if learning English was more than just studying grammar? In this course, you will explore inspiring stories, participate in meaningful discussions, and test your knowledge with dynamic quizzes, all while practicing the language! Through interactive activities and group reflections, you will develop both your English skills and qualities like empathy, collaboration, and critical thinking.
Carousel.Já imaginou ajudar sua família a encontr: Have you ever imagined helping your family find their dream home or making smart real estate deals? In this course, you will learn how to research properties, evaluate prices, and identify great opportunities, becoming a true real estate hunter!
Carousel.Você já imaginou criar um perfume que se: Have you ever imagined creating a perfume that is uniquely yours? In this course, you will learn from experts how to extract scents from plants found in your region, understand the therapeutic effects of fragrances, and create unique scents that can even promote well-being.
Carousel.E se você pudesse usar inteligência arti: What if you could use artificial intelligence to create amazing videos faster and more creatively? In this course, you will explore AI tools to script, edit, and even generate scenes automatically! Learn how to turn your ideas into impressive productions by combining creativity with cutting-edge technology.

Perks.Pagamento por matéria, horários adaptáve: Payment per subject, adaptable schedules, and national access.
Perks.Projetos estimulantes em áreas de intere: Stimulating projects in areas of student interest.
Perks.Preparação para vida profissional e auto: Preparation for professional life and self-knowledge, without competing with regular school.
Perks.Semana intensiva anual para integração e: Annual intensive week for integration and family networking

HowItWorks.Receba a grade de projetos e seus horári: Get the project grid and its schedule.
HowItWorks.Escolha seu primeiro projeto e alavanque: Choose your first project and boost your future.
HowItWorks.Você só paga pelas matérias que escolher: You only pay for the subjects you choose.

OurGoal.Nosso objetivo é ajudar cada aluno a des: Our goal is to help each student discover their true calling at a young age, saving years of indecision and misguided choices.

Parents.Sabemos que a adolescência é uma fase de: We know that adolescence is a phase of choices. At Nitro, our children use their free time to explore interests, away from the distractions of social media. We offer a safe environment with monitoring and progress reports.

Faq.A Nitro Academy é uma escola online para: Nitro Academy is an online school for students aged 11 to 15 who want to learn beyond traditional school. With dynamic classes, small groups, and a project-based approach, our students develop creativity, leadership, critical thinking, and much more!
Faq.Turmas reduzidas, projetos práticos e um: Small classes, practical projects, and a modern approach. Here, you develop skills that traditional schools don't teach.
Faq.Mais autonomia, mais criatividade e mais: More autonomy, more creativity, and more preparation for the future.
Faq.Nossa abordagem é centrada no aluno Com: Our approach is student-centered. With practical projects, teenagers apply knowledge to real-world challenges, such as creating a sustainable business or programming an educational game. We don't teach for tests – we teach for life.
Faq.Haverá Semana Intensiva Presencial?: Will there be an In-Person Intensive Week?
Faq.Uma vez por ano, famílias de todo o Bras: Once a year, families from all over Brazil gather for an immersion week! Inspiring lectures, workshops for parents, and collaborative activities for students. It's a chance to connect with other families who value innovative education. Participation is optional.
Faq.Como saberei sobre o desenvolvimento que: How will I know about my child's development at Nitro Academy?
Faq.Os pais receberão relatórios mensais sob: Parents will receive monthly reports on the projects their child is developing at Nitro and their progress.
Faq.É necessário a presença do pai durante a: Is parental presence required during classes?
Faq.É possível a participação de crianças co: Is it possible for children with special neurological needs to participate?
Faq.Se os pais acreditam que o filho consiga: If parents believe their child can participate in a focused online class, create projects, or solve challenges, feel free to enroll your child.
Faq.Você se lembra de quando era adolescente: Do you remember when you were a teenager and had time and energy, and maybe even the desire to try out various professions, but didn't always have good opportunities to do so?
Faq.É algo que a Nitro Academy veio solucion: This is something Nitro Academy came to solve, transforming adolescents' (11-15 years) free time into talent.
Faq.Exemplos de projetos já estruturados na: Examples of established projects at Nitro Academy:
Faq.Estagiando como Youtuber, Fazendo sua Pr: Interning as a Youtuber, Making your First Online Sale, Creating your Own Perfume, Creating a Cinematic Script
Faq.Somos uma escola online de projetos de i: We are an online vocational initiation project school and we are looking for professionals passionate about education who have practical experience in their professional fields to act as mentors.
Faq.Se essa proposta ressoou com você, venha: If this proposal appeals to you, come and be part of Nitro Academy. The first step is to complete this form:
